entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,208,993Chapters: 78/?Kudos: 1,178

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

entry.title: Beneath the Roses
entry.summary:
Author: YellingAtPlants

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,218Chapters: 1/15Kudos: 0

Summary: Beneath the Roses, a companion to Not All Dragons and Dandelions, from Morgana and Gwen’s perspective.---Morgana has lived under Uther's oppressive rule for many years - she has learned how to hide, how to be quiet enough to slip under the radar and keep her role in the court. Her brother has been hurt, mentally and physically, but the last straw comes on his birthday, when his soulmate mark never appears. She worries for him, for his future in Camelot.So when the new mute serving boy arrives in Camelot and immediately saves his life, it changes everything.

entry.title: The Art of Smiling Through It
entry.summary:
Author: DanaStar

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,689Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 78

Summary: Fifteen hundred years after Camlann, Merlin still waits.. trapped in an endless cycle of watching Arthur love, lose, and forget him lifetime after lifetime.When they finally reunite in modern London, Merlin dares to hope this incarnation might be different.But Arthur, blissfully unaware of their shared past, treats their relationship as casual friends-with-benefits, leaving Merlin to silently endure as Arthur falls for someone else.

entry.title: The Final Sanctuary
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,761Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 285

Summary: Perhaps he could have ignored the glittering motes of magic that danced through the room. He could have blamed this strange place of power for their presence, but he could not deny the truth that made itself plain before him, painted in blue eyes turned to bright, brazen gold. Merlin was a sorcerer. ---When Sir Leon is gravely injured, Arthur, Merlin and the knights seek shelter in an old Sanctuary cave, but the magic within is far from powerless, and the goddess is always watching. Can they overcome their fears and find their way back to freedom, or will they be lost forever in their own enmity?

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,232Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 1,146

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: I Was Born From and With It
entry.summary:
Author: Jpg_26862

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,807Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 82

Summary: He had touched magic. He whipped around, his eyes feeling like they were popping out of his skull as he gaped at Arthur. He curled his magic around Arthur, searching, seeking out the sparks he had felt moments before. And there it was. Pulsing through his veins, heightening with his enjoyment of his hunt, quickening his reaction times, making him move faster, pushing him forward. Merlin couldn’t speak a single word, even as Arthur shoved him up against a wall and ordered some of the knights around him to throw him in the dungeons. The Crown Prince of Camelot had magic, and he didn’t even know it.With Merlin's arrival in Camelot, secrets long buried are revealed from every corner, and magic runs deep.

entry.title: Wooden Dragons
entry.summary:
Author: CaffeinatedFlumadiddle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,481Chapters: 14/20Kudos: 1,195

Summary: “You-” Ygraine said, stepping up to point a finger in Uther’s face. “You are a liar and a murderer. The fact you think someone as sweet and caring as Vivienne is destined to marry you is a tragedy in itself, but if you expect me to hand over my brother’s rightful claim to Camelot’s throne-”“My claim to Camelot’s throne,” Uther threw back, face growing more red as Arthur looked between his parents in utter bewilderment. Merlin didn’t blame him. He had envisioned Uther and Ygraine’s love story to be more… well, less based in war and battles.Ygraine’s eyes narrowed as she grabbed a goblet of wine and threw it in Uther’s face. A few of the guards shifted, but Uther only raised a hand to pause them, spitting out the wine with furious eyes.“You,” Ygraine said coldly. “Are unworthy to sit upon a stool, let alone a throne.”From a few feet away, Balinor scoffed as he sipped from his own goblet. “I kind of like having her as a hostage, Uther. She livens up the place.”OrIn a desperate attempt to save Arthur at Camlann, Merlin tries to reverse time. It works perhaps a tad too well.

entry.title: Of Legends and (Rugby) Kings
entry.summary:
Author: grlnxtdr29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,690Chapters: 4/30Kudos: 12

Summary: The problem with Legends is that, over time, they are altered, misremembered, or forgotten all together. But some Legends are so great, they must be relived, again and again, until they get it right.Nick dreams only of being the Rugby King of Truham Grammar. Beyond that, he has no idea what he wants to do with his future. Until he meets a boy with curly hair, blue eyes, and dimples.Charlie dreams of Dragons, and Magick, of brave Knights, and a quest set before him, to bring back the olde ways, and set right the Legend that has been retold thousands of times. This time, he vows to set the record straight (Or not so straight.)Who knew their Destinies would collide?

entry.title: Merlin-natural
entry.summary:
Author: DrkValkyrie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,266Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Arthur has spent his whole life hunting the things that lurk in the dark. It's all he's ever known—rituals, monsters, weapons, salt lines, and scars. Merlin, on the other hand, is newer to the life, drawn into the hunt by tragedy. Together, they travel the backroads of America, chasing down the strange, the cursed, and the deadly. Both are searching for more than just the next case.Arthur chases the shadow of a father he could never live up to, and Merlin is tracking a darkness that tore his life apart.

entry.title: The Last Dragonlord (Translated to English)
entry.summary:
Author: La traductora (Botkabularia)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,279Chapters: 4/24Kudos: 9

Summary: Located in a world divided into five houses, where summer can last for years but winter an eternity, and where the magic of the ancient religion is forbidden, there was a war known as "The Magic War," in which King Uther massacred the Emrys family, exiling them from the Iron Throne and proclaiming himself as the sole King of Camelot. Fifteen years later, when King Uther mysteriously dies and his son takes the throne, the world seems to be in chaos.Caerleon, the land of the north, is protected by a giant wall of ice to separate the five houses from the dark forces that dare to be in the Pale Forest, in order to preserve peace.If there was ever peace.With the death of King Uther, the war of the five houses for the Iron Throne seems more heated than ever.And not even the approaching winter can stop it. Puedes leer la versión en español aquí.

entry.title: in every name
entry.summary:
Author: hansuckss

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,201Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Arthur very slowly reached up with both hands and covered his neck as best he could before whispering, “Are you vampires?” “What? No.” Merlin couldn’t help the small laugh of disbelief that slid up his throat, crossing his arms defensively over his chest. It didn’t matter that he was thousands of years old, or that he was bigger and stronger than Arthur was. Somehow, he was pretty sure once this conversation was over, Arthur was going to be able to crush him like a bug, and he hated that feeling.   “We’re not vampires,” Merlin said, then let out a small sigh before admitting, “we’re immortal.” Or; Merlin is immortal, doesn’t have magic, and the "Supernatural" exists. Arthur is just the great-grandson of someone Merlin once knew.

entry.title: Losing or gaining control (is sometimes closer to each other than you think)
entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,362Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. But deep friendships, trust, loyalty and love bring them ever closer to their goal.Will Merlin find the control he needs and can Arthur forget his past to open his heart?

entry.title: What if I love you way too much?
entry.summary:
Author: Brechtjeeatscheese

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,868Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 0

Summary: Arthur’s boyfriend Lance breaks up with him in a restaurant and after another fight with his dad Arthur decides he’s had enough. He impulsively signs a contract to work in Amsterdam hoping that will help him get some perspective on things.Que Merlin, a cute sex worker who Arthur decides to date just to have some fun. But when he gets to know Merlin better, Arthur finds himself falling in love with Merlin. This means having to face what that means for him and his life back in the UK.Arthur realises he hasn’t always done things right but he really wants to be a better boyfriend for the love of his life. Even if that means crossing his own boundaries…

entry.title: A Friend Indeed
entry.summary:
Author: takemetorivendell

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,965Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 50

Summary: Merlin has always protected his clotpole of a king, long before he ever became a king, but who has protected Merlin? The knights would argue they do. The servants and kitchen staff would argue just as hard that they were the ones looking after the scrawny manservant, thank you very much. But Lily, Merlin’s long-time friend, would reason she gets the honor of Merlin’s protector. After all, who is better able to protect a magic-user than a fellow magic-user?(Arthur, of course, would be completely bewildered by all of this.)But while Camelot is destined for peace and happiness, there is rather a lot of darkness and tragedy fated to happen first.
